verses.verse: וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel שְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> Now therefore hearken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַֽחֻקִּים֙ <S%H2706><s%> unto the statutes וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <S%H4941><s%> and unto the judgments אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which אָֽנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I מְלַמֵּ֥ד <S%H3925><s%> which I teach אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> לַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <S%H6213><s%> you for to do לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> so תִּֽחְי֗וּ <S%H2421><s%> [them] that ye may live וּבָאתֶם֙ <S%H935><s%> and go in וִֽירִשְׁתֶּ֣ם <S%H3423><s%> and possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> of your fathers נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לָכֶֽם׃

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תֹסִ֗פוּ <S%H3254><s%> Ye shall not add עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> unto the word אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוֶּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> which I command אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִגְרְע֖וּ <S%H1639><s%> you neither shall ye diminish מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> that לִשְׁמֹ֗ר <S%H8104><s%> [ought] from it that ye may keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְוֹת֙ <S%H4687><s%> the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוֶּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> which I command אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

עֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5869><s%> Your eyes הָֽרֹאֹ֔ת <S%H7200><s%> have seen אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> did יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God בְּבַ֣עַל פְּע֑וֹר <S%H1187><s%> because of Baalpeor כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> for all the men אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who הָלַךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> along אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after that בַֽעַל־ פְּע֔וֹר <S%H1187><s%> Baalpeor הִשְׁמִיד֛וֹ <S%H8045><s%> hath destroyed יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God מִקִּרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7130><s%> them from among

וְאַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> who הַדְּבֵקִ֔ים <S%H1695><s%> But ye that did cleave בַּיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> your God חַיִּ֥ים <S%H2416><s%> [are] alive כֻּלְּכֶ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> every הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> every one of you this day

רְאֵ֣ה ׀ <S%H7200><s%> Behold לִמַּ֣דְתִּי <S%H3925><s%> I have taught אֶתְכֶ֗ם <S%H853><s%> חֻקִּים֙ <S%H2706><s%> you statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <S%H4941><s%> and judgments כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> even as צִוַּ֖נִי <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <S%H430><s%> my God לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> me that ye should do כֵּ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> thus בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> so in הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> you בָּאִ֥ים <S%H935><s%> whither ye go שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> to possess

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֮ <S%H8104><s%> Keep וַעֲשִׂיתֶם֒ <S%H6213><s%> therefore and do כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הִ֤וא <S%H1931><s%> that חָכְמַתְכֶם֙ <S%H2451><s%> [them] for this [is] your wisdom וּבִ֣ינַתְכֶ֔ם <S%H998><s%> and your understanding לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight הָעַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> of the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who יִשְׁמְע֗וּן <S%H8085><s%> which shall hear אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַחֻקִּ֣ים <S%H2706><s%> all these statutes הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְאָמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> and say רַ֚ק <S%H7535><s%> but עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people חָכָ֣ם <S%H2450><s%> [is] a wise וְנָב֔וֹן <S%H995><s%> and understanding הַגּ֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> Surely this great הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> For מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> what ג֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> For what nation גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [is there so] great אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֥וֹ אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> who [hath] God קְרֹבִ֣ים <S%H7138><s%> [so] nigh אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> to כַּיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto them as the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> whenever קָרְאֵ֖נוּ <S%H7121><s%> [is] in all [things that] we call אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וּמִי֙ <S%H4310><s%> what גּ֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> And what nation גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [is there so] great אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which ל֛וֹ חֻקִּ֥ים <S%H2706><s%> that hath statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטִ֖ים <S%H4941><s%> and judgments צַדִּיקִ֑ם <S%H6662><s%> [so] righteous כְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> whole הַתּוֹרָ֣ה <S%H8451><s%> as all this law הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> which I set לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> before הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> age

רַ֡ק <S%H7535><s%> but הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <S%H8104><s%> Only take heed לְךָ֩ וּשְׁמֹ֨ר <S%H8104><s%> to thyself and keep נַפְשְׁךָ֜ <S%H5315><s%> thy soul מְאֹ֗ד <S%H3966><s%> diligently פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> so תִּשְׁכַּ֨ח <S%H7911><s%> lest thou forget אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֜ים <S%H1697><s%> the things אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which רָא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> have seen עֵינֶ֗יךָ <S%H5869><s%> which thine eyes וּפֶן־ <S%H6435><s%> so יָס֙וּרוּ֙ <S%H5493><s%> and lest they depart מִלְּבָ֣בְךָ֔ <S%H3824><s%> from thy heart כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> all the days חַיֶּ֑יךָ <S%H2416><s%> of thy life וְהוֹדַעְתָּ֥ם <S%H3045><s%> but teach לְבָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H1121><s%> them thy sons וְלִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and thy sons' בָנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1121><s%> sons

י֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [Specially] the day אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> so עָמַ֜דְתָּ <S%H5975><s%> that thou stoodest לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶיךָ֮ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּחֹרֵב֒ <S%H2722><s%> in Horeb בֶּאֱמֹ֨ר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> when the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me הַקְהֶל־ <S%H6950><s%> together לִי֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> me the people וְאַשְׁמִעֵ֖ם <S%H8085><s%> and I will make them hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרָ֑י <S%H1697><s%> my words אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> so יִלְמְד֜וּן <S%H3925><s%> that they may learn לְיִרְאָ֣ה <S%H3372><s%> to fear אֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיָּמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> me all the days אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> so הֵ֤ם <S%H1992><s%> they חַיִּים֙ <S%H2416><s%> that they shall live עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> upon the earth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> their children יְלַמֵּדֽוּן׃ <S%H3925><s%> and [that] they may teach

וַתִּקְרְב֥וּן <S%H7126><s%> And ye came near וַתַּֽעַמְד֖וּן <S%H5975><s%> and stood תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> the foot הָהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> under the mountain וְהָהָ֞ר <S%H2022><s%> and the mountain בֹּעֵ֤ר <S%H1197><s%> burned בָּאֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> with fire עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> unto the midst הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven חֹ֖שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> and thick darkness עָנָ֥ן <S%H6051><s%> clouds וַעֲרָפֶֽל׃ <S%H6205><s%> with darkness

וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> to you מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> unto you out of the midst הָאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> of the fire ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice דְּבָרִים֙ <S%H1697><s%> of the words אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you שֹׁמְעִ֔ים <S%H8085><s%> ye heard וּתְמוּנָ֛ה <S%H8544><s%> no similitude אֵינְכֶ֥ם <S%H369><s%> no רֹאִ֖ים <S%H7200><s%> but saw זוּלָתִ֥י <S%H2108><s%> only קֽוֹל׃ <S%H6963><s%> [ye heard] a voice

וַיַּגֵּ֨ד <S%H5046><s%> And he declared לָכֶ֜ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִית֗וֹ <S%H1285><s%> unto you his covenant אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֤ה <S%H6680><s%> which he commanded אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <S%H6213><s%> you to perform עֲשֶׂ֖רֶת <S%H6235><s%> [even] ten הַדְּבָרִ֑ים <S%H1697><s%> commandments וַֽיִּכְתְּבֵ֔ם <S%H3789><s%> and he wrote עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8147><s%> them upon two לֻח֥וֹת <S%H3871><s%> tables אֲבָנִֽים׃ <S%H68><s%> of stone

וְאֹתִ֞י <S%H853><s%> צִוָּ֤ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> me at that time הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he לְלַמֵּ֣ד <S%H3925><s%> to teach אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> חֻקִּ֖ים <S%H2706><s%> you statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטִ֑ים <S%H4941><s%> and judgments לַעֲשֹׂתְכֶ֣ם <S%H6213><s%> that ye might do אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> בָּאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> them in the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> you עֹבְרִ֥ים <S%H5674><s%> whither ye go over שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> to possess

וְנִשְׁמַרְתֶּ֥ם <S%H8104><s%> heed מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> Take ye therefore good לְנַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> unto yourselves כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> since לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> did not רְאִיתֶם֙ <S%H7200><s%> for ye saw כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any תְּמוּנָ֔ה <S%H8544><s%> no manner of similitude בְּי֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> on the day דִּבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> [that] the LORD אֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H413><s%> to you בְּחֹרֵ֖ב <S%H2722><s%> unto you in Horeb מִתּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> out of the midst הָאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> of the fire

פֶּ֨ן־ <S%H6435><s%> so תַּשְׁחִת֔וּן <S%H7843><s%> Lest ye corrupt וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֥ם <S%H6213><s%> [yourselves] and make לָכֶ֛ם פֶּ֖סֶל <S%H6459><s%> you a graven image תְּמוּנַ֣ת <S%H8544><s%> the similitude כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of any סָ֑מֶל <S%H5566><s%> of any figure תַּבְנִ֥ית <S%H8403><s%> the likeness זָכָ֖ר <S%H2145><s%> of male א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or נְקֵבָֽה׃ <S%H5347><s%> or female

תַּבְנִ֕ית <S%H8403><s%> The likeness כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of any בְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> of any beast אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> is on בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> that [is] on the earth תַּבְנִית֙ <S%H8403><s%> the likeness כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of any צִפּ֣וֹר <S%H6833><s%> fowl כָּנָ֔ף <S%H3671><s%> of any winged אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that תָּע֖וּף <S%H5774><s%> that flieth בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> in the air

תַּבְנִ֕ית <S%H8403><s%> The likeness כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of anything רֹמֵ֖שׂ <S%H7430><s%> of any thing that creepeth בָּאֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> on the ground תַּבְנִ֛ית <S%H8403><s%> the likeness כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of any דָּגָ֥ה <S%H1710><s%> of any fish אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> is in בַּמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> that [is] in the waters מִתַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> beneath לָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth
